column.name: volume_positive
column.comment: The volume (amount) added to the aggregated value

column.name: volume_negative
column.comment: The volume (amount) taken from the aggregated value

column.name: aggr_positive
column.comment: Historical value aggregating positive volumes of the items before this one

column.name: aggr_negative
column.comment: Historical value aggregating negative volumes of the items before this one

column.name: is_fixed
column.comment: Tells that this historical aggregated value is fixed. Fixed values are never modified when previous items are inserted-updated-deleted. The aggregated value equals to the last fixed historical value with updates of all the following items.
